import React from 'react'; import '../assets/css/iphone.scss'; export const IphoneView = ({usertext,userInput,shifter,suggestion,list}) =>{ const updateText =(e)=>{ userInput(e) } const updateShift=(e)=>{ shifter(e) } const exe=(val,e) =>{ setTimeout(()=>{resolve(this.val,this.e)},4000) } const resolve=(val,e)=>{ if (e.detail === 7) { userInput(val[6]) } if (e.detail === 6) { userInput(val[5]) } if (e.detail === 5) { userInput(val[4]); } if (e.detail === 4) { userInput(val[3]) } if (e.detail === 3) { userInput(val[2]) } if (e.detail === 2) { userInput(val[1]) } if (e.detail === 1) { userInput(val[0]) } } return (
updateShift(37)}>Left
updateShift(39)}>Right
updateText(1)}>1
exe(['2','a','b','c','aa','ab','ac'],e)}>2
ABC
exe(['3','d','e','f','dd','de','df'],e)}>3
DEF
exe(['4','g','h','i','gh','hi','ig'],e)}>4
GHI
exe(['5','j','k','l','jk','kl','lj'],e)}>5
JKL
exe(['6','m','n','o','mn','no','om'],e) }>6
MNO
exe(['7','p','q','r','s','pq','rs'],e) }>7
PQRS
exe(['8','t','u','v','tu','uv','vt'],e) }>8
TUV
exe(['9','w','x','y','z','wx','xy'],e) }>9
WXYZ
updateText('*')}>*
updateText(0)}>0
updateText('#')}>#
Matt Sich
123 456 7890
Calling
) }
